context.content: The push() method adds one or more elements to the end of an array and returns the new length of the array. Read the MDN documentation on push() here.
To switch directories, type <kbd>cd</kbd> followed by the name of the directory. To edit settings, press <kbd><kbd>ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>,</kbd></kbd>
This line contains preformatted text, which can include the <code> tag.

Text in a <pre> element
is displayed in a fixed-width
font, and it preserves
both      spaces and
line breaks.

Add the .pre-scrollable class to limit
the height of the
text block and enable
vertical scrolling.

Alice was beginning to get very tired 
of sitting by her sister on the bank, 
and of having nothing to do: once or 
twice she had peeped into the book 
her sister was reading, but it had no 
pictures or conversations in it, ‘and 
what is the use of a book,’ thought 
Alice ‘without pictures or 
conversations?’
